paper_abstract: This short communication first offers a clarification to a claim by Nadarajah & Kotz. We then present a short summary (by no means exhaustive) of some well-known, recent generations of Weibull-related lifetime models for quick information. A brief discussion on the properties of this general class is also given. Some future research directions on this topic are also discussed.
paper_title: On recent generalizations of the weibull distribution
